question: 顧客は何人いますか？
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers

question: 最初の10人の顧客をリストしてください
sql: SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10

question: すべての音楽ジャンルを表示
sql: SELECT * FROM genres ORDER BY Name

question: 総売上はいくらですか？
sql: SELECT SUM(Total) as TotalRevenue FROM invoices

question: 国別の売上
sql: SELECT BillingCountry, SUM(Total) as Revenue FROM invoices GROUP BY BillingCountry ORDER BY Revenue DESC

question: 売上トップ10の顧客
sql: SELECT c.FirstName, c.LastName, SUM(i.Total) as TotalSpent FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName ORDER BY TotalSpent DESC LIMIT 10

question: アルバムとアーティストをリストしてください
sql: SELECT al.Title as Album, ar.Name as Artist FROM albums al JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId ORDER BY ar.Name

question: 最も売れている音楽ジャンルは？
sql: SELECT g.Name, COUNT(il.InvoiceLineId) as TimesSold FROM genres g JOIN tracks t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId JOIN invoice_items il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY g.Name ORDER BY TimesSold DESC LIMIT 1

question: 従業員の一覧
sql: SELECT FirstName, LastName, Title FROM employees ORDER BY LastName

question: ロックジャンルのトラック数
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tracks t JOIN genres g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId WHERE g.Name = 'Rock'

question: 2009年の月別売上
sql: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', InvoiceDate) as Month, SUM(Total) as Revenue FROM invoices WHERE strftime('%Y', InvoiceDate) = '2009' GROUP BY Month ORDER BY Month

question: アーティスト別のアルバム数
sql: SELECT ar.Name as Artist, COUNT(al.AlbumId) as AlbumCount FROM artists ar LEFT JOIN albums al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId GROUP BY ar.ArtistId, ar.Name ORDER BY AlbumCount DESC

question: プレイリストの一覧
sql: SELECT * FROM playlists ORDER BY Name

question: 平均請求額
sql: SELECT AVG(Total) as AverageInvoice FROM invoices

question: 国別の顧客数
sql: SELECT Country, COUNT(*) as CustomerCount FROM customers GROUP BY Country ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC

question: トラックとアルバムとアーティストを表示
sql: SELECT t.Name as Track, al.Title as Album, ar.Name as Artist FROM tracks t JOIN albums al ON t.AlbumId = al.AlbumId JOIN artists ar ON al.ArtistId = ar.ArtistId

question: サポート担当者別の顧客数
sql: SELECT e.FirstName || ' ' || e.LastName as SupportRep, COUNT(c.CustomerId) as CustomerCount FROM employees e LEFT JOIN customers c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId GROUP BY e.EmployeeId ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC

question: 最高売上のアーティストトップ5
sql: SELECT ar.Name as Artist, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) as Revenue FROM artists ar JOIN albums al ON ar.ArtistId = al.ArtistId JOIN tracks t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId JOIN invoice_items il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId GROUP BY ar.Name ORDER BY Revenue DESC LIMIT 5

question: メディアタイプの一覧
sql: SELECT * FROM media_types ORDER BY Name

question: アメリカの顧客数
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customers WHERE Country = 'USA'
